title: Clairvoyant (Voodoo Vixens, #2).
description: Descendents of an 18th-century Voodoo Queen, the Lawson sisters are the Heirs to a legacy of powerful witches who use their gifts to protect the innocent.Looking to escape Chicago's inner city living, Latoya and Kevin Harris move their family into a remote Savannah, Ga manor. Soon, strange things start happening around their new home in escalating nightmarish terror. In desperation, Latoya contacts psychic, Yolanda Lawson, to examine the house. What the Lawson sister witches soon discover is a cursed home steeped in a spiritual haunting that is now targeting the youngest son of the Harris Family. To stop this evil, the Sisters will have to confront their own personal fears and call upon the magic of their ancestors for the strength to defeat this spectral menace.
author: J. Moon
